entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023
